Instance.description: Run to satisfy constraints for a Sim, regardless of whether or not they are a Fairy. Used to route multiple Sims to destinations when an interaction with multiple Sims has fairy Sims that require wing state changes.
Instance.parents: FairySatisfyConstraintSuperInteraction, CarryRouteSatisfyConstraintSuperInteraction, SatisfyConstraintSuperInteraction, SitOrStandSuperInteraction, RepositioningSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction
